entry.title: demo2
entry.summary:
1 class Solution {
2 public int[] twoSum(int[] nums, int target) {
3 int[] down={-1,-1};
4
5 for(int i=0;i<nums.length;i++){
6 down[0]=i;
7 for(int j=i+1;j<nums.length;j++){
8 if(nums[j]==(target-nums[i])){
9 down[1]=j;
10 return down;
11 }
12 }
13
14 }
